value.title: Democrats reintroduce bill to ban government use of facial recognition

value.title: Man Group-Oxford Quants Say Their AI Can Predict Stock Moves
value.excerpt: Man Group Plc-backed researchers at the University of Oxford say they’ve created a machine-learning program that can project how share prices move -- notching an 80% success rate for the equivalent of about 30 seconds of live trading.

value.title: Apple moves Siri's speech recognition offline with new privacy updates

value.title: China outstrips GPT-3 with even more ambitious AI language model
value.excerpt: A Chinese AI institute has unveiled a new natural language processing ( NLP) model that is even more sophisticated than those created by both Google and OpenAI. The WuDao 2.0 model was created by the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI) and developed with the help of over 100 scientists from multiple organizations.
